---
category: news
title: "VSORA introduces PetaFLOPS computational platform for self-driving cars"
excerpt: "Intellectual property (IP) vendor Vsora has rolled out a PetaFLOPS computational platform for Level 4 and Level 5 autonomous vehicle designs. The AD1028 IP block combines multi-core digital signal processing (DSP) and machine learning that eliminates the need for DSP co-processors and hardware accelerators."
